import React from 'react' import { formatMoney } from '../../untils/fnSuppport' const ProductCard = ({product}) => { return (
0 ? product?.img[0] : 'https://i.pinimg.com/originals/8a/b2/1b/8ab21b1edaa6d6d3405af14cd018a91b.jpg'} alt="" />

{product?.title}

{formatMoney(product?.price)} VNĐ

Đã bán : {product?.selled}

) } export default ProductCard
